channel.title: til unix gpg on
channel.description: Recent content in til unix gpg on

item.title: encription with gpg
item.description: Generate key 1 $ gpg --gen-key List keys 1 $ gpg --list-keys Encrypt Data With a passprhare 1 $ gpg -ca -o output.txt.gpg input.txt with a certificate and from STDOUT 1 $ gpg -ea or if you know the name already (can be key, name or email) 1 $ gpg -ea -r "Ahmy" Decrypt Data 1 $ gpg -d file.
